meanings.definition: To need or demand something as essential or necessary.
meanings.sent1: Finishing your homework will require focus and dedication.
meanings.sent2: Studying regularly is a requirement for good grades.
meanings.sent3: I didn't realize how much effort would be required to bake a cake from scratch!
meanings.sent4: His new job will require him to think on his feet.
meanings.sent5: The marathon will require all participants to push their limits.

meanings.definition: To make necessary; compel or obligate.
meanings.sent1: The rainy weather may require us to reschedule the picnic.
meanings.sent2: Following the rules will require everyone's cooperation.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected delay required us to rethink our travel plans.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the project required late nights at the office.
meanings.sent5: The urgent situation required immediate action.

meanings.sent1: I will require your assistance with this task.
meanings.sent2: The teacher may require additional help from the students.
meanings.sent3: The customer may require a refund for the faulty product.
meanings.sent4: The company will require feedback from its employees.
meanings.sent5: The event organizer may require volunteers for the upcoming festival.
